description:
With My Game Guide you will learn exactly what you need to know in order to become an expert player and beat your opponents! This is a complete guide with everything you need to know about the game PLUS you will also be able to download your free copy of the game with this purchase.

- How to Download for FREE!
- Supports iPhone ,Android, & PC.
- Overview & Basic Information.
- Professional Tips and Strategies.
- How to Beat your Opponents.
- How to Spend Zero Real Cash.
- How to Properly Defend your Base.
- Detailed Easy to Follow Instructions.
- Secrets, Tips, Cheats, Unlockables, and Tricks Used By Pro Players!
- PLUS MUCH MORE!

Purchase now and crush your opponents! Become a Pro Player Today!

Disclaimer:
This product is not associated, affiliated, endorsed, certified, or sponsored by Supercell. This guide is to be used as a reference and as such does not modify the game in any way. This is a written guide and not a software program.
